cheatsheet.title: Generate an advanced interface for the models

intro.description: The Extended Editing Framework (EEF) give you the ability to generate very quickly an advanced user interface.

item.title: Install EEF
item.description: You can download EEF from the Eclipse update site of your Eclipse version, for example http://download.eclipse.org/indigo for Eclipse 3.7 Indigo. EEF can be found in the modeling category along with over EMF-based tools.

item.title: Generate the EEF models
item.description: Right click on your genmodel and select "EEF" -> "Initialize EEF models". Now open the MASNIFEST.MF go to the dependencies tab and add there a dependency to org.eclipse.emf.eef.runtime

item.title: Generate a form-based editor
item.description: Right click on the "eefgen" model and select generate the edit and editor.

item.title: Test the environment
item.description: Launch another Eclipse instance to test this new Eclipse based tool.
